headline: Teradyne Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: NORTH READING, Mass., August 25, 2025--Teradyne, Inc. (NASDAQ:TER) today announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.12 per share, payable on September 29, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on September 5, 2025.
